page.title: 08Tempsford Divided ?
page.content: The village of Tempsford has always been divided by a road.There is a Church end to the village and a Station end,this has not helped to foster a close village community.Yet now new plans are afoot which would make ths situation even worse. The purposed plan is to close all intersections off the A1 between the Blackcat roundabout and Sandy .This plan has caused great concern in the village because if passed it would further isolate the two ends of the village.Local residents have established committes to fight the plan and are demanding the building of a footbridge or some other form of lifeline to unite the two ends of the village.
